content: free pattern viewable on my blog at https //www sweetsofties com/2024/05/maisie-bow html get the yarn kit here https //yarnsea com/en/project/2149/maisie-bow the maisie bow is a crochet pattern that features the classic sailor bow this hairbow design shows off a beautiful texture while maintaining an elegant bow shape the maisie bow can be made into a hair clip hair tie keychain or other accessory it also serves as an adorable applique for embellishing other projects since it is quick and easy to crochet it makes a great last-minute birthday gift or christmas holiday stocking stuffer for little girls they are also suitable for selling at craft fairs the pdf pattern includes progress photos as part of a photo tutorial to help guide you through the crochet process there is also a full step-by-step video tutorial available **size** width 3 25 across height 3 75 **materials** sport weight 2 yarn i used hobbii seashell yarn 4mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors *note feel free to experiment with different weights of yarn and hook sizes thicker yarn and larger hooks will create bigger bows thinner yarn and smaller hooks will create smaller bows * **level** ★★☆☆☆ familiar beginner requires familiarity with stitches used below changing yarn colors and attaching yarn **stitches & techniques us terms ** fo = fasten_off chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet fhdc = foundation half_double_crochet blo = back loops only flo = front loops only style tags vintage fairytale cottagecore kawaii *copyright notice this
